title: Rent Configuration
description: Config file relating to assumptions about rent.

monthly_rent.description: Monthly rent for the first month.

monthly_utilities.description: Monthly utilities for the first month.

monthly_renters_insurance.description: Monthly renters insurance for the first month.

monthly_parking_fee.description: Monthly parking fee for the first month

annual_rent_inflation_rate.description: ANNUAL rent inflation rate as a fraction. This will be applied to all expenses, not just rent (e.g., rent, utilities, renter's insurance, etc.).

inflation_adjustment_period.description: How often, in months, to update expenses due to inflation. Twelve is a good number here, as leases are often for 12-month periods and rents change when leases end.

security_deposit.description: The security deposit (in dollars) which will be returned back to you minus expenses that the landowner charges for cleaning, damages, etc.

unrecoverable_fraction_of_security_depos.description: The fraction of the security deposit that you expect NOT to be returned to you ever.

subsidy_fraction.description: The fraction of ALL total rental costs (including utilities, parking, etc.) that are subsidized for you (maybe you don't have to pay it due to family or friends covering it for example). Note that includes upfront costs (e.g., unrecoverable part of the security deposit) as well as monthly costs.
